shortage_reason.en_reason: Other (Please describe in comments)
shortage_reason.fr_reason: Autre (Veuillez décrire dans les commentaires)

en_comments: Product is on Protective allocation. Due to the implementation of enhanced quality testing requirements at our manufacturing site in Round Lake, Illinois, we anticipate that we will be on back order starting next Tuesday April 1st until April 25th, 2025. We currently have 1 week of supply nationally.
fr_comments: Product is on Protective allocation. Due to the implementation of enhanced quality testing requirements at our manufacturing site in Round Lake, Illinois, we anticipate that we will be on back order starting next Tuesday April 1st until April 25th, 2025. We currently have 1 week of supply nationally.
